questions.q: How do I use this app?
questions.a: In order to properly use this app, simply search for your courses and tap on the search results to add them. After that, simply select the timeslots that you wish to have on your schedule. After selecting the options for all your classes, you will be brought to a calendar page to finalize your options before you are able to export it to your calendar application of choice.

questions.q: How does this application know when to stop recurring events on my calendar?
questions.a: Using UC San Diego's academic calendar, the application is able to determine when the last week of instruction is for each quarter. As a result, the application will automatically set the end recurrence date to be week ten of a quarter.

questions.q: How do I upload my iCal file to Google Calendar?
questions.a: (1) Open Google Calendar on a computer. (2) In the top right, click 'Settings'. (3) Open the 'Calendars' tab. (4) Click 'Import calendar' between the 'My calendars' and 'Other Calendars' sections. (5) Click 'Choose File' and select the exported iCal file. (6) Choose which calendar to add the imported events to. By default, events will be imported into your primary calendar. (7) Click 'import'.
